## Matrix.PerspectiveLH() method

Creates a left-handed perspective projection matrix

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static PerspectiveLH(width: number, height: number, znear: number, zfar: number): Matrix;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  width | <code>number</code> | defines the viewport width |
|  height | <code>number</code> | defines the viewport height |
|  znear | <code>number</code> | defines the near clip plane |
|  zfar | <code>number</code> | defines the far clip plane |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Matrix`

a new matrix as a left-handed perspective projection matrix
